metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10751 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
All versions of the HTTPie package prior to version 1.0.3 are vulnerable toOpen Redirect that allows an attacker to write an arbitrary file withsupplied filename and content to the current directory, by redirecting arequest from HTTP to a crafted URL pointing to a server in his or herscontrol.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10751` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

httpie - 1.0.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: httpie package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.3-2').
